Instruction: When the oil is hot, add the bay leaves and raw peanuts; fry until the peanuts are golden brown, about 3 minutes. Add the potato cubes and fry until they are golden brown, about 5 to 7 minutes.

Transfer the remaining oil from the frying pan to a separate bowl, leaving a small amount in the pan. Add onion and cook over medium heat until softened and golden, about 5 minutes. Stir in garlic and ginger, and cook for an additional minute, until fragrant.

The nutritional value of oil used for frying has been calculated based on a retention value of 10% post-cooking. The precise amount may fluctuate based on factors such as cooking time and temperature, ingredient density, and the specific type of oil utilized.
